name: Demigos
tagline: IT solutions for startups and midsize business
description:
We know what challenges a startup faces in the early stages. By responding quickly and having adept flexibility, we deliver product solutions in the short term and provide you the ability to focus on the most important things for early-stage deployment: to find the proper product market fit and gain solid traction. By providing fully layered services, we craft a product which works and looks great, which can attract customers and be successfully presented to investors.
The automation of business processes decreases labor time, enhances cost efficiency and adds transparency. With our deep involvement in business processes and the use of cutting-edge technologies, we build unique solutions, which help companies operate more efficiently in the areas of transportation, healthcare, retail industries and beyond.
READ MORE...
